thread.title: MTV EMAs 2015: Ellie Goulding, Charli XCX, Hailey Baldwin Glam Up the Red Carpet
thread.title_full: MTV EMAs 2015: Ellie Goulding, Charli XCX, Hailey Baldwin Glam Up the Red Carpet

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: MTV EMAs 2015: Ellie Goulding, Charli XCX, Hailey Baldwin Glam Up the Red Carpet
text:
Comments Ellie donned a plunging black satin long dress with high side-slit, Charli wore a silver metallic knee-length dress while Hailey rocked a black-and-green dress with dramatic cut-out sections. 
Music beauties flocked the Mediolanum Forum in Milan, Italy to attend the 2015 MTV European Music Awards on Sunday, October 25. Among those who glittered the red carpet were Ellie Goulding , Charli XCX and Hailey Baldwin . Ellie showed off her new yellow hair. Wearing natural color make-up, she bared her cleavage in a plunging black satin long dress which featured a high side-slit. The "Love Me Like You Do" songstress completed her look with black strappy heels and some accessories. Charli donned a silver metallic knee-length dress with pointy sleeves. The "Boom Clap" hitmaker styled her black hair in half updo. She wore smokey eye make-up and red lipstick. She completed her look with a choker, a silver clutch and maroon strappy heels. Hailey, meanwhile, sported a cleavage baring black-and-green mini dress which featured dramatic cutout sections. She tied up her blonde hair in a ponytail and wore smokey eye make-up and nude lipstick. The 18-year-old model completed her look with a pair of black strappy heels. Other celebrities in attendance included Justin Bieber , Pharrell Williams , Ed Sheeran , Jason Derulo , Macklemore , Ryan Lewis, Fifth Harmony , Afrojack , Shay Mitchell , Ashley Benson and Ruby Rose . Justin donned an all red outfit consisting a jacket, long top and pants. Pharrell rocked a black blazer paired with a white tee, jeans and white shoes. Jason, meanwhile, wore a grey blazer paired with matching scarf, a white tee, black pants and black sneakers. Ed looked dapper in a black suit. Ruby donned a cleavage baring suit with long blazer and high-waist trousers. Ashley, meanwhile, wore a black see-through dress paired with a black blazer and strappy heels.
